C I R C U L A R   NO 17 / 2005 
 
 
Subject :   Entry of waitlisted/open ticket holders at airports reg: 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau Circular No. 27/2005, issued under reference of 
even number dated 31-12-2004, the Open Ticket holders may also be allowed to enter 
departure area of the terminal building, upto check-in counter for getting 
confirmation of their tickets from the concerned airlines.  
 
 
 
 
(R.C.Tayal) 
Commissioner of Security (CA)
